title: 820-3115 b
message: Hello, this macbook has a problem that it does not have sound through the speakers, it appears as blocked when pressing the button, it has already been tried with other speakers; I would like an indication to solve the problem

title: 820-3115 b
message:
Do you have the red light inside audio connector?
Remove R6805 and test again.

title: 820-3115 b
message: no red light inside audio conector, remove r6805 , I removed r6805 and the macbook has audio
